metadata.title: CVE-2023-4207 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's net/sched: cls_fwcomponent can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation. Whenfw_change() is called on an existing filter, the whole tcf_result struct isalways copied into the new instance of the filter. This causes a problemwhen updating a filter bound to a class, as tcf_unbind_filter() is alwayscalled on the old instance in the success path, decreasing filter_cnt ofthe still referenced class and allowing it to be deleted, leading to ause-after-free. We recommend upgrading past commit76e42ae831991c828cffa8c37736ebfb831ad5ec.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4207` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-245-generic - 4.4.0-245.279
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-245-generic - 4.4.0-245.279
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-245-lowlatency - 4.4.0-245.279
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-218-generic - 4.15.0-218.229~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-218-generic - 4.15.0-218.229~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-218-lowlatency - 4.15.0-218.229~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1124-kvm - 4.4.0-1124.134
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1161-aws - 4.4.0-1161.176
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1161-aws - 4.15.0-1161.174~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1170-azure - 4.15.0-1170.185~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1093-fips - 4.4.0-1093.100
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1093-fips - 4.4.0-1093.100
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-1093-fips - 4.4.0-1093.100
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.4.0-1093-fips - 4.4.0-1093.100
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1155-gcp - 4.15.0-1155.172~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1124-oracle - 4.15.0-1124.135~16.04.1

linux-kvm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1124.134').

linux-azure package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1170.185~16.04.1').
linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1093.100').
linux-gcp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1155.172~16.04.1').

linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1124.135~16.04.1').
